TopicTitle: How to replace command module in the VAB?

Articles.Content:
0.20 added this functionality, but I can't for the life of me figure out HOW to actually do it!

Any help would be appreciated.

Edited May 27, 2013 by Shadow86
Same way you would replace any part. Drag and drop it into the parts list, and pick a new one.
Yup. What you save is the stuff it's not connected to, which you can re-connect easily afterwards.
You may want to DISCONNECT any part from your pod before replacing it.

Ohhh, the problem was that the replacement module spawned within the rocket's body.

Took me a while to realize the part was there, as opposed to nowhere at all, since a bit was protruding from a fuel tank.

However, I do have to say part replacement is definitely a non-evident feature. Should be clarified somewhere.
